meanings.definition: A member of a congress, especially a member of the US House of Representatives or the Senate.
meanings.sent1: The congressmen gathered to discuss new laws.
meanings.sent2: The congressmen debated the budget in the Senate.
meanings.sent3: The congressmen joked about having a pizza party in the House.
meanings.sent4: The congressmen were like puzzle pieces fitting together in the legislative process.
meanings.sent5: The image of the congressmen in their suits left a lasting impression.

meanings.sent1: Many congressmen attended the committee meeting.
meanings.sent2: The congressmen voted on the bill unanimously.
meanings.sent3: The congressmen shared stories during their break.
meanings.sent4: The group of congressmen resembled a flock of birds in the chamber.
meanings.sent5: The congressmen's dedication to their constituents was admirable.
